Module azaidi6.schedulingapp
Package azaidi6.schedulingapp.helper

Class TimeConversion

java.lang.Object
azaidi6.schedulingapp.helper.TimeConversion
public abstract class TimeConversion extends Object
This class handles converting to/from UTC and to ET for timestamp data. The database stores timestamp data in UTC, which is converted to system default timestamp for the user.
